pr_title: Support REST API retrieval of topic message by topic id and sequence

timeline.message:
Initial changes for rest api to suppost topic message retrieval by topic and seqnum

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Merge w master to get PR 613 changes

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Cleaned up merge code and response format. Also added spec tests

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Added topic message tests and corrected transaction-id error message

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Remove next link logic

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Merge w rest integration coverage increase from master

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Standardized error format and moved some code to utils. Also added more tests

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Made index unique and centralized mroe test logic

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

Removed duplicate message test as it's n/a with new index

Signed-off-by: Nana-EC <56320167+Nana-EC@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: Please don't remove this. It's not testing uniqueness of db data, but of disparate service layers potentially returning dupes and checking if service filters them out.
timeline.author: steven-sheehy

replies.bodyText: The test fails because you can't insert the duplicate messages with the new unique index of realm_num, topic_num and sequence_number.
replies.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: The test would have to be modified or moved from this file to send back duplicates that don't reflect actual db duplicates in that case
replies.author: Nana-EC

replies.bodyText: Ah, I see. We'll probably have to rewrite it as a mock test in the future. We can do that later.
replies.author: steven-sheehy
